bibl.title: In the Matter of the application of Thomas Allen for a writ of Habeas Corpus. Judge Statement

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Puget Sound Regional Branch

div1.p: In Dist Court of 3rd District holding terms at Seattle
In the Matter of the application of Thos Allen for writ of Habeas Corpus
And with Court on this 19th day of April this cause comes on for having. Prosecuting attorney W. W. Newbin present & Defendant present in person & by E. C. Million counsel.

The Court being fully advised in the promises servies there which and orders the defendant Petitioner Thos Allen remanded to the Jail of King County
C H Hanford Judge
A CRO 6739 E In the Matter of the Application of Thos Allen "R"227
FILED APR 19 1889 W. E Ledgerwood Clerk. By Deputy Clerk.
